title: API Configuration
description: Sets up a POST endpoint at /ts/pets where clients can send requests to create new pets.

title: Request Body
description: Defines what data the API expects - pet name, species (dog, cat, bird, or other), and age in months.

title: Creating the Pet
description: Takes the validated data and creates a new pet in the store with all the necessary details.

title: Logging
description: Records that a pet was created with details like ID, name, and species for tracking.

title: Triggering Background Jobs
description: Sends out events to kick off background jobs - one for general pet creation tasks and another to set up feeding reminders.

title: Success Response
description: Returns the newly created pet back to the client with a 201 status code.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches problems like missing required fields or invalid data and returns helpful error messages.
